name: Draw me like you do
description:
HAPPY NEW YEAR!

This game is fairly short.

It was a trial of some codes I wanted to do in my games.

It worked out okay... I guess.

The game is kinda odd. It's weird.

But I never make normal games ;w;

Enjoy!!

NOTE: There are 6 routes but there's one last clickee under after you are finished with everyone :D

===========================

Statistics:

The game contains 455 dialogue blocks, containing 2,833 words and 15,229

characters, for an average of 6.2 words and 33 characters per block.

The game contains 18 menus, 21 images, and 24 screens.

===========================

I got the music in neosounds.org
